args:
Valyx has dispatched his army based on the
testimony of a scout that was attacked near
the border. When he arrives, he discovers a
mystery group raising a mangled remnant of
his own flag. Quietly seething at this mockery,
Valyx commands his forces to attack.
*sigh* There's not a job more tedious than\na scout with no enemies TO scout.
This whole thing feels like a goose chase.\nMaybe those fellows earlier saw a bear\nand mistook it for an enemy?
Or maybe whoever they saw were so\nafeared of General Valyx that they\nfled back into northern Grastaea.
Ha ha! Certainly possible! Even this far\nnorth, there isn't a man alive what hasn't\nheard tale of the general's might and—
L-Lieutenant, sir! When did you...?\nI mean, er, apologies, sir!

Whatever the time or circumstances,
you will carry out duties to the absolute
best of your ability and give them your
UNDIVIDED attention. Am I clear?
Sir, yes, sir! Perfectly clear, sir!\nLike a brook in springtime, you are!
Hmph. I think I have a few jobs for you\nwhen we return to headquarters.\nPrepare to be worked to the bone!
Yes, sir! Happy to be worked thusly, sir!
And don't think you're getting off easily,\nsoldier! I've plans for you as well!
Dammit, man, if you're faking this...\nHrm. Not good. He isn't breathing.
What the hell? He was alive\njust a second ag—Uuuungh...
Hey! No one is dying on my watch,\ndo you hear me?!
...Damn these fools! I ordered them not\nto die before me, and they went ahead\nand did it anyway!
I REPRESENT THE GREAT GENERAL VALYX,\nAND I DO NOT FEAR YOU! NOW COME FOR\nME, IF YOU HAVE THE GUTS!
Near the Northern Border\nValyx's Army—Main Force
(It's been some time since I've\nmade for the northern border...)
(I wonder what flag our mysterious\ninvaders will be flying.)
(They can't possibly be anyone\nfrom northern Grastaea.)
(Which means it must be some\nmanner of thieves, rebels, or—)
C-calm down, Lieutenant! Stop screaming!\nWhat in the blazes happened?!
General Valyx, sir! One of the scouting\nparty has just returned, and he's...\nWell, you can see how he is.
Look at me, Lieutenant. Calm yourself.\nThere are no enemies here.
Near the border... They were...\nmonstrous... Nnnngh...
I can scarcely believe it's him...\nThis was a tough-as-nails man feared\nby friend and foe alike...
And look at these wounds—it's as though\nhe was mangled by some kind of beast.
Yes, but not fatally. Whatever did this\nwanted to break his mind, not kill him.
Who would commit such an atrocity?
Take this man and see him safely home.\nHe needs rest and recovery.
The rest of you, make haste with your\npreparations. We leave at once for the\ncheckpoint!
We're nearly at the checkpoint.\nBe on your guard—our enemies\ncould be lurking anywhere.
Did we really come all the way\nup here for FIVE enemies?
Sir, look! They're flying our own standard,\nbut it's been mangled and shredded!
So they seek to mock us, do they?\nSo be it. In that case, we will mark\nour strength indelibly upon them.
All troops, attack! And I want them ALIVE!
Insulting my army... Toying with my men...\nOnce I learn all I can wring from them,\nthey can spend the rest of eternity in hell.
